note: Specialized runner - see extra_data for details

vulnerability_location.description: The contract makes an external call to recipient via withdrawReward (line 13) before updating claimedBonus (line 23), allowing reentrant calls to getFirstWithdrawalBonus

The public function withdrawReward lacks any authorization check (no require(msg.sender == recipient) or similar), allowing any caller to invoke it and withdraw funds on behalf of arbitrary recipients.

External call using recipient.call.value forwards control to recipient fallback, which may revert or consume gas, causing the withdrawReward call to fail and permanently blocking withdrawals (denial of service).
Floating pragma version '^0.4.24' is used, allowing different compiler versions and potential inconsistent behavior.
